title: Wish there was like a 1.25 to 2.25 seconds knockup on 6 second CD in League.
body:
Wait sion and he's tank as f.

This is a joke right?

It's still Halloween right?

Trick or treat we're playing jokes on you with this kind of bs yeah?

It would be nerfed if people played Sion more than once or did so competitively oh wait they do and they abuse the crap out of this OP p.o.s but sometimes have more dignity and play champs that require skill and don't have spammable 6 second massive AOE zoning/knockup capabilities that can end up being on a 3.6 second cooldown with spirits visage and blue buff which is like. Yay 3.6 seconds I will channel for 1-2 seconds after slowing you then knock you up for 1-2 seconds then start channeling again after 1 second.

Wow that is literally the most expensive thing Riot has ever done.

Worst thing since release Diana 2 shot me with 2 Doran's rings or Karma melted me in 2 seconds from 2K HP to - 0 in 3 seconds with Muramana.

If you stun him it goes on like 2 second cooldown and its like 600 range.

Could not think of worse BS to have to deal with late game.

Yer but when there's someone who can kite it also means there's a super dead Sion,

Sion kills anything that is within his grasp, but can't do shiet jack when they're far away from him (also his Q is both telegraphed, requires channeling and self rooting), and it's not like his ulti is up every single second. Yeah he has E but I believe it took a bat last time if I am not wrong so there's that too.

I don't think he is OP or like broken, since if anything he should be a model example for any bruiser characters (well not entirely but you get the point) that are coming in the future and I'm not kidding because he's that well designed imo.
